title: @Riot, will the 2 for 1 Rune Page offer be making an appearance?
body:
I've been told from LoL veterans that at the end of each season there is a 2 for the price of 1 Rune Page offer. 

I reaaaally hope this is true, will it happen this season too?

replies.body:
Not sure! Keep your eyes peeled and on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any announcements regarding this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
